name: Quarter (Hungry8)
description:
Description

 The Old Town of Vecescaen is full of tangled alleys. The city keeps different stories - most of them are ordinary, but some are curious or even frightening. Among the many streets and squares, one small quarter was lost. A quarter of artisans and craftsmen. And I clearly see, that a grain of what was born in it, will affect the fate of the whole old city.

 Features

  • A brief introduction to the story of one of the characters
  • Mystical medieval tale with detective elements 
  • Old-style adventure game
